  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: GROUND HAZMAT PACKAGE FOUND LEAKING DURING PRELOAD. NO ADDITIONAL EXTERNAL SPILLAGE. DESIGNATED RESPONDER ISOLATED AND TRANSPORTED PACKAGE TO DMP CAGE FOR FURTHER INSPECTION AND DISPOSAL.

item.title: Report E-2025060093
item.description:
Report E-2025060093

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-22T01:13:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-06-02
  • City: HOOKSETT
  • State: NH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: A. DUIE PYLE INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The forklift operator was moving a short pallet and had his fork blades protruding from the back side of the pallet. As the operator loaded the pallet behind another the fork blades stabbed the pail on the back side causing the spill. The spill only lasted a couple of minutes. The damaged pail was placed in an overpack container. Absorbents were placed in the spill area then placed in a separate overpack container in preparation for dispostion.
